name: Terranova Training
tag_list: training, awareness, security, privacy, information-security, sustainable-development
overview:
Terranova provides comprehensive training and communication solutions that positively change behaviours. Terranova’s products are the foundation for creating tailored awareness programs in information security, sustainable development, privacy as well as other compliances, which are driven by internal policies and regulatory/compliance requirements.

Terranova was founded in 2002 based on the need for organizations to train their staff on the growing security requirements that establishments faced. Since then, Terranova has built a team of information technology education and security professionals with more than 20 years of related experience and has helped business and governmental organizations worldwide in more than 10 different languages.

Over 300 companies already rely on solutions and tools developed and customized for them by Terranova. More than 1.5 million users are actively following online courses.
